required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Oral Health Knowledge and Practice Among 8-9 Years Old Children.

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this study is to identify the knowledge and behavior on dental health and hygiene among adolescents. In most cases, the investigators know tooth decay can be prevented and reversed at an early stage by observing good oral hygiene. Few studies have been done among adolescents.
This study could justify the implementation of public health actions in terms of prevention.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Test group Classes with a classical lecture style presentation classes with an intervention in the form of fun workshops on different themes by small groups of schoolchildren (8-10 children per workshop) classes with digital media intervention

primary_outcome.measure: comparison of children's notes before and after a prevention intervention
primary_outcome.description: The main result will be calculated with the total score to the questions. Each question corresponds to a point. The minimum score is 0 and the maximum score is 25. We will compare the evolution of the averages obtained by the control group and by all three other groups with Student test

other_outcome.measure: Compare the evolution of children's grades according to the type of intervention
other_outcome.time_frame: before and after the explanation as well as one month and 6 months after the intervention
other_outcome.description: For the secondary objective, we will compare the evolution of the averages obtained between the three groups with intervention with ANOVA test. Each question corresponds to a point. The minimum score is 0 and the maximum score is 25. before and after the explanation as well as one month and 6 months after the intervention

other_outcome.measure: Determine the timeframe by which children forget the information they have been given
other_outcome.time_frame: before and after the explanation as well as one month and 6 months after the intervention
other_outcome.description: A questionnaire to know the oral knowledge will be distributed to the children before and after the explanation as well as one month and 6 months after the intervention

arm_group.description: 2 control CE2 classes without oral sensitization actions
2 CE2 classes with a classical lecture style presentation
2 CE2 classes with an intervention in the form of fun workshops on different themes by small groups of schoolchildren (8-10 children per workshop)
2 CE2 classes with digital media intervention

intervention.intervention_name: an intervention in the form of fun workshops
intervention.description: an intervention in the form of fun workshops on different themes by small groups of schoolchildren (8-10 children per workshop)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- All children of classrooms selectionned
Exclusion criteria:
- Children absent on the day of the intervention
